- Directly above (6, 18) is unobstructed while (6, 17) is a wall.
- Directly below (8, 18) is also encapsulated by walls.
- Moving left (7, 17) is currently an empty space.
- Right (7, 19) is a wall.

With this in mind, my best action is to move left to (7, 17). This opens up more possible routes and avoids the threat of immediate enemy contact.

``` Action: 2 ```
I expect this movement will keep me safe while opening possibilities for further strategic moves towards the goal.
